attributes.action: Overturn law to stop no deal brexit
attributes.additional_details: It is against the people democratic and human rights to make a law to take away their right to a no deal.
attributes.background: The British in 2016 people took a democratic vote to leave the EU, two options, leave or remain. Nothing about deals or being left tied to the EU, that means no deal. It is against the peoples democratic will to make a law to stop a no deal.
